name: Samsung Galaxy S21
description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 features a 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, 5G connectivity, and a powerful triple camera system. With 8GB RAM and 128GB storage, it's perfect for photography and gaming.

name: Apple MacBook Pro
description: The Apple MacBook Pro features the M1 chip, 13-inch Retina display, and up to 20 hours of battery life. Perfect for professionals and creatives with its powerful performance and stunning display.

name: Sony WH-1000XM4 Headphones
description: Industry-leading noise cancellation, exceptional sound quality, and up to 30 hours of battery life. These wireless headphones offer premium comfort and smart features like adaptive sound control.

name: Nintendo Switch
description: The Nintendo Switch console transforms from home console to handheld system. Play your favorite games anywhere with the 6.2-inch touchscreen and detachable Joy-Con controllers.

name: Dyson V11 Vacuum
description: Powerful cordless vacuum with intelligent suction and up to 60 minutes of fade-free power. Features LCD screen, three power modes, and whole-machine filtration for cleaner air.

name: Instant Pot Duo
description: 7-in-1 multi-functional pressure cooker that combines 7 kitchen appliances in one. Features 13 customizable smart programs, 1000W of cooking power, and 10 safety mechanisms.

name: Kindle Paperwhite
description: Waterproof Kindle with a 6-inch glare-free display, adjustable warm light, and weeks of battery life. Store thousands of books and read comfortably day or night.

name: Bose SoundLink Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with powerful sound and deep bass. Features 12 hours of battery life, built-in microphone for calls, and water-resistant design.

name: Fitbit Charge 4
description: Advanced fitness tracker with built-in GPS, heart rate monitoring, and sleep tracking. Features 7-day battery life, contactless payments, and 20+ exercise modes.

name: GoPro Hero 9
description: 5K video camera with 20MP photos, HyperSmooth 3.0 stabilization, and waterproof design. Features front display, removable battery, and 30% more battery life.
